title: Simple Smoothing Function
name: LGF_SimpleSmoothingFC
description: The function calculates the linear mean value acyclically.

output.name: error
output.description: FALSE: No error TRUE: An error occurred during the execution of the FB

in/out.name: values
in/out.description: Values that are to be included in the smoothing.

return_value.description: Void - Function has no return value

status_codes.16#8401: ERR_ARRAY_DIFFERENT Error: The Arraysizes are not equal.

description_zh: 一个函数FC，该函数对输入的LReal型数组进行简单的平滑处理。它通过计算数组中每个元素及其相邻两个元素的平均值来实现平滑。如果输入数组和输出数组的长度不匹配或长度小于3，函数将返回错误状态。函数没有返回值。
